sn45.20:1.2: “Reverend, they speak of this thing called the ‘spiritual path’.
sn45.20:1.3: What is the spiritual path? Who is someone on the spiritual path? And what is the culmination of the spiritual path?”
sn45.20:1.5: Your approach and articulation are excellent, and it’s a good question. …
sn45.20:1.10: The spiritual path is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.20:1.11: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.20:1.12: Someone who possesses this noble eightfold path
sn45.20:1.13: is called someone on the spiritual path.
sn45.20:1.14: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion:
sn45.20:1.15: this is the culmination of the spiritual path.”
